price: Los creyentes sinceros tomarán bebidas dulces en copas aromatizadas,
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارَ يَشۡرَبُونَ مِن كَأۡسٖ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: inna al-abrāra yashrabūna min kasin kāna mizājuhā kāfūran
